function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Using a permissioned blockchain for providing data sharing from the medical perspective.","Impact":"Potential risk of unauthorized access to sensitive medical data.","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust access control measures and encryption techniques.","Technologies":"Blockchain, encryption, access control systems.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, researchers.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, IT administrators."},{"Description":"Utilizing a centralized cloud-based storing service to ensure the availability of medical data.","Impact":"Risk of data vulnerability and single point of failure.","Mitigation":"Implementing data backup and redundancy measures, encryption, and regular security updates.","Technologies":"Cloud storage, encryption, data redundancy, security patches.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, researchers.","Owner":"Cloud service providers, healthcare organizations."},{"Description":"Enhancing security considerations when sharing sensitive data with the deployment of a discrete wavelet transform and a genetic algorithm technique.","Impact":"Potential risk of data privacy breaches and algorithm vulnerabilities.","Mitigation":"Regular security audits, algorithm validation, and continuous monitoring of data access.","Technologies":"Discrete wavelet transform, genetic algorithms, encryption, security audits.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, researchers.","Owner":"Security experts, IT administrators, researchers."}]}
